comments.html:
I asked ChatGPT the same question, but re-phrased it a bit to make it more clear:

"I have a network configuration with four routers A,B,C,D. Router A is connected to routers B and C, router D is connected to routers B and C. Each router has a loopback interface. Can you generate a Cisco configuration for these routers, so router A will be able to reach loopbacks of routers B,C and D?"

And the result of this is exactly the same as your GPT-4 response except I got wider network mask /24 than /30, but it is a working configuration. The simpler the GPT model, the clearer and precise the query should be (this works with humans as well).
comments.name: Vlad Bashkatov
